**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** 1 --- This handheld snare drum is adorned with garish scenes of battle and triumph. When played, no matter what rhythm, it always gives the impression of a marching beat, invoking armies on the move. While playing the drums, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks and a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Drums of War **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
  • **1st** [_mage armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=176), [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
Drums of War (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292), [_spiritual weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
  • **3rd** [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=149)
Drums of War (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus to Performance checks is +2.
  • **4th** [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296), [_tortoise and the hare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1021)
  • **5th** [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), [_quicken time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1187), _spell immunity_
name: Drums of War
